actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit the retention of business holdings by private foundations in certain circumstances.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit a private foundation to retain certain excess business holdings where: (1) the board of directors of the foundation and the managers of the business enterprise in which the foundation has such excess holdings are limited to a crossmembership of not more than 25 percent; (2) no disqualified person can be a foundation manager after the enactment of this Act; and (3) no disqualified person can receive compensation from both the foundation and the business enterprise.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit the retention of business holdings by private foundations in certain circumstances.
